attributes.action: Divert Foriegn Aid Money to the Devastated Flooded areas of the UK.
attributes.additional_details: York, South Yorkshire and many other parts have lost belongings through flooding, even some building have been ruined beyond repair and because of massive hikes likely in insurance costs many many people have given up. We must look after our own people Now.
attributes.background: Many parts of the UK have been flooded out 3 or more times in the past weeks and little aid has come their way, We need to look after our own at times like this and make sure that these people get all of the help they need
